Module it.polimi.ingsw.GC24
Package view

Class RemoteView

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.RemoteView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GameObserver, TurnObserver, MessageTarget, Observer
    public class RemoteView
extends java.lang.Object
implements GameObserver, TurnObserver, MessageTarget
    This class represents the abstraction of the Client, observed from the point of view of the Server It is the communication Link between the Client and the Server
